0.text: Innate: Periodically, Nocturne empowers next basic attack to slash in a circle that deals 120% AD physical damage to the target and nearby enemies,  healing himself for 13 − 30 (based on level) (+ 30% AP) per enemy hit. Against  minions, Umbra Blade's damage to secondary targets and healing are reduced by 50% and it applies  on-hit effects(bug) to all targets at 100% effectiveness.
0.html: Innate: Periodically, Nocturne empowers next basic attack to slash in a circle that deals 120% AD physical damage to the target and nearby enemies, healing himself for 13 − 30 (based on level) (+ 30% AP) per enemy hit. Against minions, Umbra Blade's damage to secondary targets and healing are reduced by 50% and it applies on-hit effects(bug) to all targets at 100% effectiveness.

1.text: The attack can  critically strike, modifying the physical damage dealt to the primary target to「 (192.5% +  38.5%) AD. 」「 110% of the  critical damage of his basic attacks. 」
1.html: The attack can critically strike, modifying the physical damage dealt to the primary target to「 (192.5% +  38.5%) AD. 」「 110% of the  critical damage of his basic attacks. 」

2.text: Basic attacks  reduce Umbra Blades'  cooldown by 1 second, increased to 3 seconds against  monsters and enemy  champions.
2.html: Basic attacks  reduce Umbra Blades' cooldown by 1 second, increased to 3 seconds against monsters and enemy champions.

0.text: Active: Nocturne casts out a shadow blade in the target direction that leaves a Dusk Trail in its wake, dealing physical damage to enemies hit. Enemy  champions hit will leave a Dusk Trail behind while moving. Dusk Trails last 5 seconds and will slowly disappear afterwards.
0.html: Active: Nocturne casts out a shadow blade in the target direction that leaves a Dusk Trail in its wake, dealing physical damage to enemies hit. Enemy champions hit will leave a Dusk Trail behind while moving. Dusk Trails last 5 seconds and will slowly disappear afterwards.

1.text: While on the Dusk Trail, Nocturne is  ghosted and gains  bonus total movement speed and  bonus attack damage.
1.html: While on the Dusk Trail, Nocturne is ghosted and gains  bonus total movement speed and  bonus attack damage.

0.text: Passive: Nocturne gains  bonus attack speed.
0.html: Passive: Nocturne gains  bonus attack speed.

1.text: Active: Nocturne gains a  spell shield for 1.5 seconds. Upon successfully blocking a hostile effect, Shroud of Darkness' bonus attack speed is doubled for 5 seconds
1.html: Active: Nocturne gains a spell shield for 1.5 seconds. Upon successfully blocking a hostile effect, Shroud of Darkness' bonus attack speed is doubled for 5 seconds

0.text: Passive: Nocturne gains  90% bonus movement speed while moving towards  feared targets within  1000 units.
0.html: Passive: Nocturne gains  90% bonus movement speed while moving towards feared targets within 1000 units.

1.text: Active: Nocturne torments the target, forming a  tether between himself and the target for 2 seconds, during which the target takes magic damage over the duration.
1.html: Active: Nocturne torments the target, forming a tether between himself and the target for 2 seconds, during which the target takes magic damage over the duration.

2.text: If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, the target is  feared for a duration while being  slowed by 90%.
2.html: If the tether is not broken by the end of its duration, the target is feared for a duration while being slowed by 90%.

0.text: Active: Nocturne terrorizes all enemy champions,  nearsighting them for 6 seconds. He can recast Paranoia for the same duration after 0.25 seconds.
0.html: Active: Nocturne terrorizes all enemy champions, nearsighting them for 6 seconds. He can recast Paranoia for the same duration after 0.25 seconds.

1.text: Recast: Nocturne  dashes with  displacement immunity to the target enemy champion, dealing  physical damage upon arrival.
1.html: Recast: Nocturne dashes with displacement immunity to the target enemy champion, dealing physical damage upon arrival.

2.text: Nocturne can cast any of his abilities during the dash.
2.html: Nocturne can cast any of his abilities during the dash.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Keywords

  • totem
  • trinket

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+7% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Challenging Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Challenging Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all of this item's effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • jungle

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).
passive.originText: UNIQUE: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Halting Slash: Deal 175% base AD physical damage to enemies in a 450 radius centered around you and slow them by 40% for 3 seconds. Can move while casting (15 (reduced by ability haste) second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – HALTING SLASH: Deal 175% base AD physical damage to enemies in a  450 radius centered around you and  slow them by 40% for 3 seconds. Can move while casting (15 (reduced by ability haste) second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Heroic Gait: Dealing physical damage grants you 20 bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 2% bonus movement speed.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – HEROIC GAIT: Dealing physical damage grants you 20 bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+55 attack damage
+15 ability haste
+45 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 30% / 10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
Unique – Defy: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage, and heals you for 120% bonus AD over 2 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IGNORE PAIN: Stores ( 30% /  10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+55 attack damage
+20 ability haste
+50 magic resistance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Lifeline: If you would take magic damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs ( 200 / 150) (+ ( 225% / 168.75%) bonus AD) magic damage for 5 seconds (75 second cooldown).
Unique: Triggering Lifeline also grants 10% omnivamp for 5 seconds. After 2 seconds into the duration, taking or dealing damage refreshes this effect to 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – LIFELINE: If you would take magic damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a  shield that absorbs ( 200 /  150) (+ ( 225% /  168.75%) bonus AD) magic damage for 5 seconds (75 second cooldown).

passive.originText: UNIQUE – REBIRTH: Upon taking lethal damage, enter  resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards  heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
